title: LOOT: Free Champion?
body: Can someone help me with a question I have, I need an answer. I have a new account and received my first loot box. Upon opening it I got a champion "Jayce" and the option says upgrade to permanent with no charge. Is this a mistake? Is it just the first champion free to make permanent? Or are all champions from loot boxes now free to make permanent?

replies.body: That first lootbox is a special one for new players! It's meant to contain a champion permanent instead of the usual shards ^_^!
So I cant hold off to unlock a champion I want?
